actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 37, United States Code, to revise the special pay provisions for dental officers in the Armed Forces of the United States.
short_title: Armed Forces Dental Officers Special Pay Act of 1985

summary.text: Armed Forces Dental Officers Special Pay Act of 1985 - Revises both the amount of special pay to which a dental officer is entitled and the amount of time a dental officer must have served on active duty in a specified category to be entitled to special pay. Sets forth special pay provisions for dental officers undergoing residency training. Requires specified officers receiving additional special pay to agree to remain on active duty for at least one more year. Requires an officer breaking such agreement to refund a prorated amount. Permits the Secretary of the relevant military department to terminate such additional pay at will.

titles.title: Armed Forces Dental Officers Special Pay Act of 1985
A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 37, United States Code, to revise the special pay provisions for dental officers in the Armed Forces of the United States.
